Title: Relates to developing and implementing benchmarking standards for the total annual use of energy and water for certain buildings
Summary: Directs the department of state to develop and implement benchmarking standards for the total annual use of energy and water for certain buildings.
LawCode: Amd ยง11-102, add ยง11-111, Energy L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the energy law, in relation to developing and implementing benchmarking standards for the total annual use of energy and water for certain buildings
